verbose_text: We prepared both types of mouse models by daily administering the same molar dose of T1-NRG1 (1.0 mug/g body weight) and eNRG1 (0.3 mug/g body weight) to mouse pups, allowed them to reach 2 months of age, and challenged with MK-801 or saline.
evidence: eNRG1 (0.3 mug/g body weight) to mouse pups, allowed them to reach 2 months of age
